member.name: T:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR
member.summary: A connection to a Universal Robot. Allow to retrieve the robot state (position, diagnostic information, state, ...) and also to send commands.

member.name: E:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.InternalErrorOccured
member.summary: Event raised when an error occured during robot communication

member.name: E:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.KinematicsInfoReceived
member.summary: Kinematics information data (Raised when connection opened)

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.RegisterLicense(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: If you have a license and a key, please call this static method to register the product and exit the trial period You can register a product even if the trial period has ended
member.param: The associated key supplied by UnderAutomation

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new instance of UR

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.Send(System.String)
member.summary: Remotly execute script.Please see the Universal Robot Script documentation : https://www.universal-robots.com/download/.
member.param: The script command to execute. You can for example move the robot at a specified coordinate with the command : movej([0,1.57,-1.57,3.14,-1.57,1.57],a=1.4, v=1.05, t=0, r=0)

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.Connect(System.String,UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts)
member.param: (Optional) Connection port on the robot. Default : 30001

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.Disconnect
member.summary: End the connection with the robot.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UR.Connected
member.summary: Return True if the connection to the robot is active

member.name: T:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.StatusCode
member.summary: Status code that describes an internal error or an internal action

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.StatusCode.ReadThreadAborted
member.summary: The read threat has stopped due to an internal exception. No more data event will be raised.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.StatusCode.DecodageError
member.summary: The data received are inconsistent and it not possible to decode it.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.StatusCode.SendCommandInternalError
member.summary: Unable to send URScript because of an internal error.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.StatusCode.SentCommandIsEmpty
member.summary: Unable to send URScript because the script sent is empty.

member.name: T:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts
member.summary: TCP ports to communicate with an UR controller

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts.PrimaryClient
member.summary: The default port that allow reading data and sending URScript

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts.SecondaryClient
member.summary: The secondary port with same features as PrimaryClient

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts.PrimaryClientReadOnly
member.summary: This port can only read data. It is unable to send URScript.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.UniversalRobotPorts.SecondaryClientReadOnly
member.summary: A secondary port that can only read data. It is unable to send URScript.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.InternalErrorEventArgs.Exception
member.summary: The exception thrown that causes an internal error

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.InternalErrorEventArgs.Message
member.summary: Explicit message that explains what happened

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.InternalErrorEventArgs.Status
member.summary: Context status associated to this internal error

member.name: T:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.PackageEventArgs
member.summary: Base class of all received data packages

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.PackageEventArgs.ReceiveDate
member.summary: The date the data has been received

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.Timestamp
member.summary: Timespan since the robot controller as started

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.PhysicalRobotConnected
member.summary: Robot is connected to its controller

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.RealRobotEnabled
member.summary: Real robot mode active. False if robot is in simulation

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.RobotPowerOn
member.summary: Robot is powered on and boot is completed. If false, you need to press "ON" button to power it on.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.EmergencyStopped
member.summary: The button Emergency Stop is pressed

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModeDataPackageEventArgs.ProtectiveStopped
member.summary: A stop occured due to a fault detection.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModes.Disconnected
member.summary: Robot is not connected to its controller

member.summary: Robot has stopped due to a Safety Stop

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModes.Idle
member.summary: Power is on but breaks are not released

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.RobotModes.BackDrive
member.summary: The robot is hand guided by pushing teached button

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.ControlModes.Teach
member.summary: The robot is hand guided by pushing teached button

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.ControlModes.Force
member.summary: Robot is force controlled. (For example : URScript force_mode() function is called)

member.summary: The analog value is in Volts (V)

member.summary: Current of all digital and analog inputs and outputs

member.summary: Robot is in reduced speed mode

member.summary: Register where each bit is a digital Euromap output

member.summary: Register value seen as a bool array

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.Normal
member.summary: Safety is in normal operating conditions

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.ProtectiveStop
member.summary: Protective safeguard Stop. This safety function is triggeredby an external protective device using safety inputs which will trigger a Cat 2 stop3per IEC 60204-1.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.Recovery
member.summary: When a safety limit is violated, the safety system must be restarted.

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.SafeguardStop
member.summary: (SI0 + SI1 + SBUS) Physical s-stop interface input

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.SystemEmergencyStop
member.summary: (EA + EB + SBUS->Euromap67) Physical e-stop interface input activated

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.RobotEmergencyStop
member.summary: (EA + EB + SBUS->Screen) Physical e-stop interface input activated

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.SafetyModes.Violation
member.summary: Safety is in violation mode (for example, violation of the allowed delay between redundant signals)

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a new LicenseInfo instance to retrieve informations about a pair of identifier/key This class should not be used to register your product. Please use static function UnderAutomation.UniversalRobot.UniversalRobotInterface.RegisterLicense to register a license.
member.param: The name of your organization (null for trial version)
The key, associated to the identifier, supplied by UnderAutomation (null for trial version)

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.AssertIsLicensed
member.summary: Throw a InvalidLicenseException if the license is Invalid or Expired

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.LicenseKey
member.summary: The license key supplied by UnderAutomation (null for trial period)

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.Product
member.summary: Commercial name of this .NET Software library

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.EvaluationDaysLeft
member.summary: Remaining days of the trial period. Null if the product is licensed. It could be negative if the trial period is ended since several days.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.EvaluationStartDate
member.summary: The date the trial period starts. If the product is licensed, the date of the library first use.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.TrialPeriodExpirationDate
member.summary: The date the product will expire. Null if the product is licensed.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.ProductReleaseDate
member.summary: The date this version of the product was released.

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.MaintenanceYears
member.summary: Number of maintenance years included in your license

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.LicenseIssuedDate
member.summary: The date you get the license

member.name: P:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.MaintenanceExpirationDate
member.summary: The date your maintenance contract end and you no longer can use this license with newer versions.

member.name: M:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseInfo.ToString
member.summary: A human description of the license

member.name: T:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState
member.summary: States that can take a license

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState.Invalid
member.summary: The pair License Identifier and License Key are incompatible, you cannot use the library

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState.Trial
member.summary: The library is in a trial period, you can use the library

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState.ExtraTrial
member.summary: The library is in an extra trial period, you can use the library

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState.Expired
member.summary: The trial period as expired, you no more can use the library

member.name: F:UnderAutomation.UniversalRobots.LicenseState.MaintenanceNeeded
member.summary: Your license does not allow you to use such a recent release. Please buy maintenance to use this version
